title: Total hardwood , production in Canada 2018
summary: This graph depicts the Total hardwood production in Canada 2018 in cubic meters .
The values range from roughly 57000 in March to 46000 in December .
January to March there is an increase in production , March to July production decreased and reached 50000 in July .
gold: This figure depicts the total Canadian hardwood production in cubic metres of 2018 . Whereas it starts off in January at approximately 1050 cubic metres , production fluctuates until reaching its maximum in May at around 1250 . There is a sudden drop , reaching the minimum annual value in July at below 800 cubic metres .
